/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Street lamps and signs punctuate the scene, adding elements of urban design. In the distance, a red building stands out, its color contrasting with the surrounding greenery. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
